Package org.buildmlearn.practicehandwriting.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CharacterSelectionActivity
    Activity to let the user choose a character
    FreehandActivity
    Activity for freehand (borderless) tracing of a given character
    IncompleteActivity
    Activity that will be displayed when the user tries to access those activities that haven't been completed.
    LanguageActivity  
    MainMenuActivity
    Activity that displayes the main menu where the user chooses his mode of practice.
    PracticeActivity
    Activity for normal practice of characters and words
    SplashActivity
    Splash Screen Activity
    TimeTrialActivity
    Activity for Timed tracing of characters/words
    TimeTrialResultActivity
    Activity to display the results of the Time Trial session
    TutorialActivity
    Activity that displays the tutorials to a first time user
    WordSelectionActivity
